The parents of an individual with an autosomal recessive condition each carry one copy of the mutated gene, but they typically do not show signs and symptoms of the condition.",GHR,otospondylomegaepiphyseal dysplasia
What are the treatments for otospondylomegaepiphyseal dysplasia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of OSMED:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Otosp
